## Question 3 (Ch7, #6, 8 marks)

(a) (5 marks)

library(ISLR); data(Wage)
k<-10; nDf <- 10; seed <- 1; cvErrs <- rep(NA,nDf)
cvDat <- matrix(NA,nrow=nDf,ncol=4) for(df in 1:nDf) {
res <- cv.lm(wage ~ poly(age,df),Wage,k,seed) merr <- res$meanErr; serr <- res$sdErr cvDat[df,] <- c(df,merr,merr-serr,merr+serr)
}
colnames(cvDat) <- c("df","meanErr","lwr","upr") 
library(ggplot2)

dfs <- plot.cv.lm(cvDat)

 fit <- lm(wage ~ poly(age,dfs$df.1se),data=Wage)
newdat <- data.frame(age=seq(from=min(Wage$age),to=max(Wage$age),length=100)) dfs$df.1se
plotfitWage(fit,Wage,newdat)
round(summary(lm(wage ~ poly(age,nDf),data=Wage))$coef,2)





(b) (3 marks)

nDf <- 10
cvDat <- matrix(NA,nrow=nDf,ncol=4)
ageMin <- min(Wage$age); ageMax <- max(Wage$age) ageMin <- ageMin - 0.001*(ageMax-ageMin)
ageMax <- ageMax + 0.001*(ageMax-ageMin)
for(df in 2:nDf) {
ageBreaks <- seq(from=ageMin,to=ageMax,length=(df+1)) res <- cv.lm(wage ~ cut(age,ageBreaks),Wage,k,seed) merr <- res$meanErr; serr <- res$sdErr
cvDat[df,] <- c(df,merr,merr-serr,merr+serr) }
colnames(cvDat) <- c("df","meanErr","lwr","upr") cvDat <- na.omit(cvDat)
library(ggplot2)
dfs <- plot.cv.lm(cvDat)

ageBreaks <- seq(from=ageMin,to=ageMax,length=(dfs$df.1se+1))
fit <- lm(wage ~ cut(age,ageBreaks),data=Wage)
newdat <- data.frame(age=seq(from=min(Wage$age),to=max(Wage$age),length=100)) dfs$df.1se


plotfitWage(fit,Wage,newdat)
